channel.title: VoTT on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in VoTT on Memo Tut

item.title: Creation of TFRecord file for object detection
item.description: ## Introduction Last article summarized how to use the Object Detection API provided by TensorFlow. To use this API to teach “This object is ○○” from images and videos, Annotate and convert to TFRecord format, It will be used as teacher data and verification data, I feel that there are still few articles that mention the specific contents of this TFRecord format. In this article, from the method that can be created without programming at the beginning, We will put together various angles to write and create Python code.
